resources.string: [Long press to select and drag the marker]

We request your support and cooperation in ensuring safety and public order in view of the Enhanced Community Quarantine. This app is part of the efforts of the UP COVID-19 Pandemic Response Team spearheaded by the UP Resilience Institute (UPRI).
We value your personal privacy. Please register here to open an account.

Developed by the Data Analytics for Research and Education (DARE)-Project 3 (Information Exchange Platform for the Public Sector) housed at the University of the Philippines National College of Public Administration and Governance (UP-NCPAG).
Visit www.safetravel.ph. For comments and suggestions, send email at admin@safetravel.ph
Detailed description of incident like checkpoint/medical emergency
